quotes.text: The educational process must again provide the opportunity for students to make choices and live with the consequences of these choices. Teaching is not simply telling people what to believe and do.
quotes.author: Donovan L. Graham

quotes.text: Shouldn't we also ask ourselves what the consequences are of scrambling to provide the "most" of everything to our children in a world of fast dwindling resources?
quotes.author: John Taylor Gatto

quotes.text: An educated mind is a questioning mind. Or is it?
quotes.author: T.S. Welti

quotes.text: A proactive learner can have the ability to acquire a vast amount knowledge to use critical thinking because he or she has the passion comprehending complex principles, theories and tasks in daily life and career settings.
quotes.author: Saaif Alam

quotes.text: books are education and education is power. The more education the people acquire the more equal society will become. Universal learning is the foundation of a fairer future for mankind.
quotes.author: Helen Culnane

quotes.text: A clever schoolboy's reaction to his reading is most naturally expressed by parody or imitation.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: At a time like this maybe the world is looking at us not just at a miracle crusade or sunday church service but the way we are living. Maybe they want to see whether what our Master left for us worked for us; there is a counter spirit to the spirit of fear, it is the love of God.
quotes.author: Patience Johnson

quotes.text: Every maker of video games knows something that the makers of curriculum don't seem to understand. You'll never see a video game being advertised as being easy. Kids who do not like school will tell you it's not because it's too hard. It's because it's--boring
quotes.author: Seymour Papert

quotes.text: If you want to know the secret of life, learn with enthusiasm and love with all of your heart.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.text: One land also shall ask another, and say, '˜Is righteousness that makes a man righteous gone through thee?' And it shall say, '˜No.
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.text: A single course of studies for all progressive schools is out of the question; it would mean abandoning the fundamental principle of connection with life-experiences.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.text: An educator should consider that he has failed in his job if he has not succeeded in instilling some trace of a divine dissatisfaction with our miserable social environment.
quotes.author: Anthony Standen

quotes.text: A student must be humbled to trained by teacher.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.text: Live your epitaph
quotes.author: Zoe Weil

quotes.text: We do not recognize that we are addicted to some negative psychological habit, some terribly self-destructive patterns of thinking...
quotes.author: Abhishek S

quotes.text: Waktu seorang menolong, pastinya kata ini tak bisa terlupakan : 'œThank you'. Saat anda memohon pertolongan pada orang lain serta ia merampungkan pekerjaan yang anda berikanlah kata simpel ini utama untuk dilukiskan. Misalnya : 'œThank you for your help'.
quotes.author: Azminda Cancino

quotes.text: By starving the sensibility of our pupils we only make them easier prey to the propagandist when he comes. For famished nature will be avenged and a hard heart is no infallible protection against a soft head.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: What "wasting time" means? At the time we glorify self instead of glorify God, at that time we are wasting our time as... God is Time.
quotes.author: indonesia123

quotes.text: God always sees me with no make-ups on because He knew how we started.
quotes.author: Patience Johnson

quotes.text: We haven't even reached 0.00000001% of where we want to reach. There is so much more to do. We want to make sure that no child should ever be on the mercy of anyone else for his/her education.
quotes.author: Sharad Vivek Sagar
